name: CubiX Fragment
description:
CubiX is a platform puzzle game, developed on Unity 3D and available on the Android Store. 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Lushkin.CubiX.LWRP

You play as a Cube that travels through the different levels made up of tiles. Some are interactive and allow you to modify the structure of the level (puzzle) in order to unlock new paths. The goal is to collect all the fragments before reaching the finish tile. It is possible to customize the cube with "Skins", which the player can acquire in exchange for the money they earn by completing the levels.

Resolve tons of levels by moving your Cube on different tiles. Explore them and collect the the CubiX fragments to unlock Worlds. Your journey only begins !

Customize your Cube with multiple skins. And try to unlock them All!

- Tons of levels
- Progressive difficulty puzzles
- Multitude of tiles to allow you finish the levels on your own way

You can challenge yourself and be the best of every players :
- Finish levels as quickly as you can...
- ...within less steps possible...
- ...collecting all the fragments
